function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of hvac systems during infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential ineffective use of uv lamps for killing viruses, harmful organisms, and bacteria in homes","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on houseplants as a sole solution for air purification in naturally ventilated homes","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Developing standardized daylight levels without considering disease transmission risk","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper ventilation and air circulation in limited-sized domestic spaces","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close physical interaction with live plants in home gardening may facilitate the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased physical interaction with outdoor spaces such as balconies may contribute to the spread of airborne diseases.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagious diseases from close physical interaction with live plants","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases such as covid due to home overcrowding","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of additional space for quarantine room and attached bathroom for infected persons","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate home entry area design may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases by failing to provide effective decontamination and hygiene measures.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and lighting in home workspaces may lead to poor indoor air quality and discomfort for remote workers.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of spatial organization in the home may lead to increased risk of disease transmission between different activities and areas within the home.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate handling and delivery system for goods and services may lead to potential exposure to contaminants during the transfer of items into the home.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases in the built environment due to open floor plans and lack of privacy","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of noise transmission in open-plan layouts","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The use of movable walls and adjustable open plans may increase the risk of airborne disease transmission within the home.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shared living spaces increase the risk of contagious disease transmission, especially during an epidemic.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of aeroponic systems for food production within the living environment may introduce new health risks and potential contamination.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on home automation and smart homes may lead to a higher risk of exposure to contagious diseases within the household.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to electromagnetic waves from 5g technology may have potential health risks.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased time spent cooking and eating at home leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases in the kitchen","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fomite transmission of covid-19 through contaminated surfaces in households","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of the coronavirus on various household surfaces","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coronavirus settling for a longer time period on surfaces at lower temperatures and in conditions of low and high relative humidity","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 lasting for several days on certain materials such as plastics, ceramics, silicone rubber, glass, and stainless steel","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trends against antimicrobial additives may lead to reduced use of effective materials that can prevent the spread of viruses on surfaces.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presence of coronavirus genetic material in wastewater with increasing prevalence of covid-19 infection","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fecal-oral transmission of infectious diseases through wastewater","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of chlorine in drinking water during distribution as an additional precaution","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emergence of new viral infectious diseases","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of diseases from animal species to humans","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of infectious diseases via indoor air","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate housing conditions contributing to the spread of contagious diseases, including covid-19, due to lack of safety and healthy environments.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate quarantine facilities and isolation spaces within housing environments, leading to uncontrolled transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address the housing needs of marginalized groups, leading to increased vulnerability to contagious diseases and public health disparities.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spreading of infectious diseases in pre-pandemic homes","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residents’ mental, psychological, and physical health problems","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Epidemics posing a future risk","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and airflow in residential spaces leading to increased risk of disease transmission","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate spatial design leading to overcrowding and close contact among residents","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient separation of different zones within homes leading to cross-contamination among different areas","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor air quality contributing to increased number of deaths","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survival of sars-cov-2 in the air and on surfaces","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient treatment of outside air in hvac systems may lead to the escape of microscopic particles, including covid-19 viruses, into treated air, posing a risk of infection.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Study of air conditioners and their relationship to the global pandemic may uncover risks related to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Indoor air pollution contributing to the spread of covid-19","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to indoor pollutants as a result of poor ventilation","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 can be transmitted by inhaling the virus from more than one and a half meters.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of particles from infected individuals throughout a room or indoor location.","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
